fields.name: U Mad? (Passive):
fields.value: If you win the game, the game instantly ends and anyone who hasn't already won loses. This doesn't apply to players who won at the exact same time as you.

fields.name: We Do A Little Trolling (x1, Charge 60%):
fields.value: Astrally target a player. You may write a piece of mod feedback that they receive at the end of the Night. You may use this as many times per Night as you wish, as long as you have enough ammo.

fields.name: Oof Ouch Owie (Passive):
fields.value: Your Defense Power decreases by 0.4x every time you are attacked.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Die during a Day phase! (By lynch or kill)
